default.title: Doi - The Trusted Smart Auction Platform
default.description: Buy and sell products through Doi's trusted and smart auctions. Join our community and start your journey today.

home.title: Authentication Dashboard | Doi
home.description: Access and test all authentication flows for buyers and sellers on the Doi platform.

buyer-landing.title: Shop with Doi | Smart Auctions & Trusted Deals
buyer-landing.description: Discover a new way to shop. Join Doi as a buyer and participate in smart auctions for high-quality products.

seller-landing.title: Sell on Doi | Start Your Journey as a Seller
seller-landing.description: Turn your products into profits through Doi's trusted and smart auctions. Start selling today.

buyer-login.title: Buyer Login | Doi
buyer-login.description: Log in to your Doi buyer account to manage your auctions, bids, and profile.

buyer-login-password.title: Login with Password | Doi
buyer-login-password.description: Log in to your Doi buyer account using your phone number and password.

buyer-register.title: Join Doi | Create a Buyer Account
buyer-register.description: Sign up for a Doi account today and start participating in smart auctions.

buyer-forgot-password.title: Reset Your Password | Doi
buyer-forgot-password.description: Forgot your password? Enter your phone number to reset your Doi account password.

buyer-verify-otp.title: Verify Your Account | Doi
buyer-verify-otp.description: Enter the verification code sent to your phone to secure your Doi account.

buyer-reset-password.title: Create New Password | Doi
buyer-reset-password.description: Set a new password for your Doi account to regain access.

buyer-register-success.title: Registration Successful | Welcome to Doi
buyer-register-success.description: Your account has been successfully created. Welcome to the Doi community!

buyer-reset-password-success.title: Password Reset Successful | Doi
buyer-reset-password-success.description: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in to your account.
